What is their vacation policy?: Zania, Inc. provides employees with paid vacation. All full-time regular employees are eligible to receive vacation time immediately upon hire. Vacation is calculated according to your work anniversary year. The amount of vacation received each year is based on your length of service and is granted in a lump sum at the beginning of each year. Vacation granted during your first year of employment will be prorated based on your hire date. You are eligible to begin using vacation immediately upon hire. You must request vacation from your Manager as far in advance as possible, but at least a specified number of days in advance. The Company encourages you to use your vacation time. Upon separation of employment for any reason, you will forfeit any earned but unused vacation time unless state law dictates otherwise.
What is the termination policy?: Your employment with Zania, Inc. is on an "at-will" basis. This means your employment may be terminated at any time, with or without notice and with or without cause. Likewise, we respect your right to leave the Company at any time, with or without notice and with or without cause.
